snippet: Bob Woodward’s “The Price of Politics” paints a portrait of dysfunction that began even before President Obama was inaugurated and has only grown worse.
abstract: Book The Price of Politics by journalist Bob Woodward chronicles the descent of Barack Obama’s Washington into partisan trench warfare and mines the minutiae of the largely failed negotiations between House Republicans and the White House to tame the nation’s deficit problem.

byline.contributor: Jennifer Steinhauer, Annie Lowrey and Michael S. Schmidt contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Bob Woodward’s “The Price of Politics” paints a portrait of dysfunction that began even before President Obama was inaugurated and has only grown worse.

headline.seo: Woodward Book Details Battles Over Deficit
headline.main: Woodward Book Details Battles Over Deficit
headline.print_headline: New Book Details Struggle Behind Failed Deficit Talks
